comment.author: 36330824621@N01
comment._content: I really like the detail of the woman hanging clothes to dry on the roof top! Gelocation tags are for the listed address for the tall building in the picture, El Mundo Newspaper, from Oficina Estatal de Conservación Histórica. The register says the building's address is Calle San José #54 Viejo San Juan. Since the picture shows the San Juan Bay in the background, I infer the picture was taken from another tall building in the same block, but located on Calle Cruz.
